alert.note: Alert for Leon; Madison; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 17 at 3:05AM EST until further notice by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Big Bend Florida, including the following counties, Jefferson, Lafayette, Leon, Madison, Taylor and Wakulla. * WHEN...Until 800 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 305 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Monticello, Mayo, Perry, St. Marks, Madison, Florida A and M, Florida State University, Crawfordville, Tallahassee Community College, Steinhatchee, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Greenville, Sopchoppy, Lee, Cabbage Grove, Eridu and Iddo. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
